item.title: Tesla Stock Rises Premarket After EV Maker Launches Cheaper Model Y Variant In US
item.description: The new Model Y AWD expands entry-level choice with a new AWD option between base and premium trims.

item.title: Nvidia Stock Climbs Premarket: Investors Are Locked In Amid Buzz Of OpenAI Deal Friction
item.description: NVDA rebounds nearly 1% in premarket after an almost 3% drop the previous day.

item.title: Humana Stock Slips Premarket After Hitting 9-Year Low: Morgan Stanley Sees Medicare Advantage Risk In 2027
item.description: Morgan Stanley downgraded the stock following CMS’s proposed 0.09% Medicare Advantage rate increase for 2027.

item.title: Which Is GameStop’s ‘Big’ Buy? Michael Burry Lists His Targets While Retail Bets On eBay And Peloton
item.description: GameStop CEO Ryan Cohen last week signaled that the company is considering an acquisition of a publicly listed retailer.

item.title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher Ahead Of Earnings Rush: Why PLTR, AMZN, TSLA, WULF Are On Traders' Radar Today
item.description: Retail sentiment on major ETFs such as SPY and QQQ remains mixed on Stocktwits.
